Dewboy, you cnat ignore it that was a game this is supposed to be a 
simulation of real life. Stop making excuses for something you dont want to 
have to do. If it will help the RPG then do it and quit whining and trying to 
think up ways to say "Well we don't have to" Anyone who joins this RPG and 
sees a charachter firing 120 blasts over the course of 3 posts or even just 
40 blasts in one post is going to be turned off unless they are some immature 
little kid. Want to play in the big leagues dewboy? THen act like an adult 
and don't complain about something you would deem is uncool.
